Class PlayerClientData

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am33.client.model.PlayerClientData
public class PlayerClientData extends Object
Represents the client-side data of a player in the game. This class is used to manage information specific to a player, such as their nickname, associated color, current credits, position on the flying board, and their ship board data.
